类型: Team Name: Easy PeezySize: LargeColor: Sea Blue
评论详情: Right out of the package the fabric is soft and sturdy. Well sewn. The color is pretty (dark blue). The dress is a little tricky to get on at first, but it's supportive and flattering. I'm a 36DD and it was a little hard to adjust the straps to tighten up the support, but not a big deal once you get them where you need them. I wish it was a tiny bit shorter, because I'm short but the length isn't awkward. I'm crossing my fingers that it's comfortable in the heat and humidity. I'll update my review is it's not breathable. I got the easy peezy style for the ability to use the restroom without having to take it off. I'm curious if the shorts will get stretched out over time. Definitely would buy more, but it seems like they're having trouble keeping them in stock.

I was looking for something comfy to wear to the airport and this athletic dress did not disappoint. The material is so comfy. It compresses at the right spots. My chest was supported well and it was very flattering in the stomach area and hid the mommy tummy. After the airport, I wore this dress in Miami. It was nice and airy which was great on a hot and humid day. I definitely recommend this dress.

评论概述: Great fit, flattering at waistline but those with thicc thighs and chest might have a little trouble
评论详情: **TW: Sizes/dimensions at bottom  This dress is fantastic and a great “dupe” of other athletic/tennis/traveler dresses that are often more expensive! What really sticks out to me is the flattering tapering at the waist line.  This dress can be easily dressed up or down, and is comfortable to walk around/run errands/make a day trip in! I have a larger chest, but felt decently supported in this dress, albeit there is a fair amount of cleavage especially when viewed from the top (not anything over-the-top or uncomfortable though). It also mushes your tatas together a la sports bra and there is no underwire, so do bear that in mind if that is a fit that you dislike.  The material of this dress is a stretchy, smooth athletic material. I love the supportive feeling of the attached bodysuit/romper, which is only stitched to the dress at the neckline, which I think is totally fine as it contributes to the flow of the dress (FYI—the dress can be lifted all the way to reveal the bodysuit underneath. I’m not sure why you’d do that, but you can!). As many others mentioned, you will have to roll the entire dress down off your body to use the restroom as with a one-piece swimsuit, so do bear that in mind in case you’re planning to wear this dress in a less private area!  Additionally, due to the flared/non-fitted fit of the dress, I could eat freely (I bloat without fail whenever I eat—even during low-carb meals!) but still retain that flattering tapered waistline! Huge star in my book. I did notice that after several hours of walking, the shorts ran up a bit and my (quite large/muscular) thighs were definitely chafing which we all know is a terribly uncomfortable experience. Weighing down the attached short pockets with my phone/wallet helped a little, but not entirely. For that reason, although I was decently happy with the length of the dress (I was worried it would be too short as shorter dresses often are on me), I wish the dress and shorts were an inch or two longer. I think in the future for days with lots of walking/exploring I will wear an extra pair of biker shorts over the top of the attached romper shorts in this dress for added inner thigh protection.  It’s also a teeny bit awkward getting to the mouths of the included pockets under the dress (despite the shorts), especially for frequently-accessed things like my phone or wallet, so I try to keep less frequently-needed items there.  I docked a star for the discomfort d/t chest and thighs, but all in all, I HIGHLY recommend this dress, and those close to me know that I have been raving about it non-stop lol. Big bobbie and leggie approved!  TW: here are my measurements (I ordered a Large in black and I believe it was spot-on): - Chest: 36DD, 39” - Underbust: 33” - Waist: 31” - Hips: 38” - Around the bum: 42”

The outfit is a lot more comfortable than I had imagined. Think of a compression workout outfit, but with more space. I chose this dress to wear to walk around Disney because it is very hot in Florida. The outfit was perfect. It was not too tight nor too loose and has stretchy material. I’m 5’1 I weigh 150 and I chose a medium and it’s a perfect fit

Bought this dress to take to Las Vegas to walk around in and it was PERFECT! The shorts underneath made me feel concealed and also helped my legs not chafe which is always a huge bonus. It fits really well and the straps are adjustable!

It fit, it just was tight around there and I didn’t like it showing. I wish it was a little more flowy. & it is pretty short but not too bad. I’m currently working hard to lose weight, so we shall see in a few months! It is low cut, but the pads in the bra part are really nice!!
Flattering, comfortable, and priced well. Sized as expected.

类型: Team Name: ClassicSize: X-SmallColor: Sea Blue
评论详情: Out of five orders this is my fav quality dress/short combo, if you’re boujee then don’t get it. Pull the shorts to the side to pee through the leg and get over it. It’s tight fitting and acts as a body suit. The conjunction of the bra and under garment work together to keep you tucked in and join at a sports bra line under the boob. I removed the pads although they did help to push up but I tossed them and replaced them with cakes I wasn’t looking for that I was going for casual and comfy in the summer heat. They did help the girls though but again wasn’t going for that. Not a real fan of the aesthetics of the adjustable back straps and that’s my only complaint. Looks kinda like you crossed the two straps yourself from the back. Was hoping for a brighter dark teal and it came as navy which matched my eyes and worked out I guess. Would highly recommend aside from the minor personal opinions! High quality likely not an easily snagged material and I am pretty rough with clothing. Hopefully they come out with other colors and improve the cross in the back!

Before hanging make sure the pad inserts are flat and positioned correct because it will cause a crease in the pad. I'm 5'4 for reference.

I really loved the length of this and it was comfortable and well made. The M fit me well. It was more expensive but had build in padding which I loved the fit of.

This tennis dress has an A-line, fit-and-flare shape to it that I find really slimming and flattering. I’m keeping this one and returning others with more fluttery skirts. The built-in “shapewear” (not shaping or slimming, just smoothing) makes everything underneath smooth.

I’m so happy with this purchase! I bought it in 4 colors! It is so flattering and comfortable! I’m 5ft tall and 130lbs and ordered a medium and it fits perfectly! Great length and shape! I love the adjustable straps!

It's the perfect summer dress! I've worn this dress to summer parties, on nature walks, running errands. It's super comfy and makes the girls look good! Love the adjustable straps. Super slimming too! Just all around an awesome buy!

I have seen this dress on several influencers and kept putting it in my cart, then taking it out. I just didn’t think it was going to work on my body type. I gained the COVID 20 over the last two years and have a stomach pooch (okay…it might be more than a “pooch”). I ended up ordering this with the idea that I could return it if it didn’t work so “let’s just see what happens”. LOVE this. Very flattering even with a pooch. The built in shorts, bra and padding are top notch. Smooths everything out and holds things in. I got my regular size large (seriously considered XL though). The large is snug but not in a bad way. Hugs all the right places. The length hits right at my upper thigh which I wouldn’t care for if this was a skirt or dress but the shorts underneath give me confidence that I’m not going to be giving anyone a show. I got this in black. Will be great with a flannel tied around the waist and tennis shoes. I’ll probably live in this on weekends, at Disneyland, exploring new cities, etc.

Ugh I cannot say enough about this dress. I was just stopped last week by someone asking me about it. The shorts are super comfy but have no pockets, fyi. I typically wear it with sneakers and a jean jacket for that "cool mom" look. I also just slip on some flip-flops and run errands too.  Note that if you are blessed in the chest, this doesn't have a lot of coverage. It shows enough where I wouldn't wear it to work but it's ok for regular, everyday life.  Comparisons: Old Navy: I've tried on several of the Old Navy Sleeveless Powersoft Performance Racer-Back Mini Swing Dress and the large was slightly too big, but the medium was slightly too tight. The large fit me perfectly for this one.  Target: the ones I've tried on here just feel cheap. The material of this one is soft and stretchy.

类型: Team Name: ClassicSize: X-LargeColor: Sea Blue
评论详情: READ THE REVIEWS FOR SIZING! According to the size chart, I would have been an XXL. But I listened to the reviews and looked at the pics of people wearing the dress. I got an XL and it fits perfectly! I'm 200lbs., 5'7", and postpartum by 4months with my second kid via c-section- so you know what belly and boob situation we are working with. The boob area wasn't the most supportive, but I wore a cotton maternity sports bra underneath and it worked well for support. LOVE the pockets. I could bring my phone and credit card without bringing a purse (which is great because I'm just carrying baby things in a backpack). I haven't washed it yet, but I'm sure the boob inserts will fall out and get creased. But I'd definitely buy more in other colors.

The fit on the chest was a little weird for me. I ordered a large and I'm a 34D and it feels like the cups (which I later removed) couldn't support me correctly. It sort of creates this single block of narrow chest like I'm a Nintendo 64 polygon. I ended up wearing a sports bra underneath and it looks a bit better, especially after shortening the straps to be less revealing. I like the length too (5'3") but I wish it did a little more to make my waist smaller. There was also potential for some flattering compression on the tummy area, but it really doesn't do much at all. Overall, pretty cute dress! I think it's worth maybe half as much as I paid, but it's still cute.

I was looking for the perfect tennis/athletic dress and have finally found it. I am 5'2 and got a size small. The fit and length is perfect. I love the built in bra and shorts, it feels super secure and the fit is very flattering. It sucks you in just a bit at the waist and doesn't have too much of a flare (which I prefer). It's not too loose but not too tight (aka perfect). The straps are also adjustable which is a huge plus. If you're looking for a super comfy dress that can be dressed up or down, this is the one. I'm definitely getting this in more colors!!
I love the Quality of the fabric and everything, but to use the bathroom you got to take all the whole dress off.

IUGA is such a good brand. The fabric and seam quality is always high. The size charts are accurate.  I have so many pairs of their yoga shorts that I use for running. They have been worn and washed over and over and there is no pilling, the seams maintain their integrity, and they are just as stretchy as the day I got them. This dress is the exact same.  I also have a halara dress and this one fits me better. The fabric is maybe not as butter smooth and the more expensive brands, but I still find it super comfortable and I wear this one more than my halara.

The stretch in the shorts is perfect for back where I am more than blessed. The skirt length and cut is very flattering. It falls in a way that doesn’t hide my curves but it still helps conceal any bloating I may have. I am basically living in these dresses. I’ve worn it for exercise, errands, lounging at home, happy hour and I bought the lime colored one for the vacation I’m taking next week.

Dress it up, dress it down, perfect for all things summer! It’s so comfortable and so flattering. A little bit of a pain when you need to pee, but worth the hassle. I’m short so it’s a bit longer on me than I was hoping, but not so much as to be frumpy. I might have been able to get away with the next size down, but I don’t like things to squish out, so went with the size my measurements suggested. I will definitely be ordering in other colors and will probably try a large in my next one for comparison. The material is thick and the quality is great. Adjustable straps for just the right fit up top. I’m a runner and although I don’t think I would wear this to run, I can definitely see some lighter exercise being just fine in this dress. Very pleased with this purchase!!

This dress is so comfortable and flattering that anyone can wear it and feel like they look their best! Good material and nice stretch. Pockets for phone are nice but thin and may pull the dress down with the weight of a phone (I will not be using them unless I have to). Overall, great dress for the price compared to other "boutiques" or name brand stores. I will definitely purchase in another color.

I'm 5'9", 145lb, size 2-4, long waisted (so onesies don't always work/pull at the crotch) and the size small fits well. Love that it doesn't show sweat a lot...took this picture right after I got back from a 50 min bike ride in VA summer (HOT).Recommend!

The pocket is nice but if you actually put your phone in it it makes my hips look too wide so I don’t but it’s nice to have if you need it.

this dress is so good. it sucks you in, doesnt show the fupa lol, bra support is good even without pads (i took them out). so versatile! i bought for a trip to disney world because i wanted something easy and lightweight. the shorts underneath suck you in and are a good length (i have big thighs) and hopefully will be long enough to prevent chafing. dress is super cute for day to day, athleisure, or even tailgates and stuff like that! highly recommend. it also was a great length considering im 5'3 ~ 140 lbs. Great stretch, good quality dress. It fit well, but will return because it was shorter than I expected. The dress covers the built in shorts, but barely. And the shorts end at the bottom of your butt cheeks. So the dress is only a couple inches past that point. I also ordered Old Navy’s Powersoft dress with built in shorts and bra. That one hit more mid thigh for me, and I prefer that length.

I just had a baby and still have a belly that makes me look pregnant so I was looking for something to wear that was cute , great for summer and helped hide my belly . Well this dress is it!! I had a XL in the past and wearing it threw out my pregnancy I ended up stretching it out bad . So I went and bought a medium in hopes I would eventually fit into it. But to my surprise I fit in it and it makes me feel amazing .

评论概述: So comfy and cute for everyday!
评论详情: This was so cute and great material! I love the pockets and the fact that it has built in shorts, so theres no lines showing under the dress. I would wear underwear that doesn't show seams to keep it that way. The fact that it's like a romper underneath the dress is nice because it keeps your tummy tucked in. It has padding in the breast area so no bra is needed. I am 5'2 weighing 169-170 pounds and i fit a medium perfectly!
I purchased this for an upcoming trip to Disney.  I will be wearing this all spring and summer.  It is so comfortable and flattering.  I wish it came in more colors!
It does everything I wanted and more. Comfy and sexy. Very pleased with my purchase!

评论详情: So easy to put on and fits well

This is honestly my first review after being a long time and very frequent prime consumer. I love this dress… the pockets are always a plus. The fit is awesome. I am 5’9 and about 200 lbs with a curvy/thick  figure. Got an XL and it is very comfortable without being too tight or loose, just right.  Wanting to buy more in other colors but would love for the maker to add a back cutout feature (below the skirt where the shorts meet) for easy potty usage.

I bought this dress to play “tennis” in it. I swear I wore it all summer. I work out in it. I wear it to the grocery store. I even wore it while 9 months pregnant because it had such a stretchy material. It fits like a glove and the top layer hides my belly. I have it in two colors! It feels light weight. 135 lbs and I wear a medium.
Good quality, but if you have a bigger chest. This ain't for you.
Bought this months ago and still love it! Great material that has not pilled since purchasing. So cute and versatile. Easy to throw on for an easy outfit! Would purchase again.
